name: Girl Shotgun Dungeon
description:
Game for the Mini Jam 117: Ghosts!

Hey, girl! Survive waves of ghosts in a dungeon, with a shotgun!

Girl Shotgun Dungeon is a A small retro-gameboy-like game where you must survive and each second that passes is one more point! Watch out the ghosts-- one hit and you're dead--

Try to get over 80 points-- It's a challenge

This game was developed in 2 days with the help of @pixeliivii (Twitter), couldn't be done without him.
